tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE MarketDataFeeds (
    feed_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    feed_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    exchange_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    asset_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    price DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW()
);

CREATE TABLE arbitrage_opportunities (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    symbol TEXT NOT NULL,
    buy_price DECIMAL NOT NULL,
    sell_price DECIMAL NOT NULL,
    profit DECIMAL NOT NULL,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE ArbitrageLog ( 
    id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    action VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL, 
    symbol VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, 
    price DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL, 
    timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL 
);

CREATE TABLE TradeHistory ( 
    id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    symbol VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, 
    quantity INT NOT NULL, 
    price DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL, 
    timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL 
);

CREATE TABLE market_data_feeds (
    symbol VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    price DECIMAL NOT NULL,
    volume DECIMAL NOT NULL,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    PRIMARY KEY (symbol, timestamp)
);

CREATE TABLE arbitrage_opportunities (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    symbol VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    buy_price DECIMAL NOT NULL,
    sell_price DECIMAL NOT NULL,
    buy_timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    sell_timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    profit DECIMAL NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE market_data_updates (
    update_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    symbol VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    updated_price DECIMAL NOT NULL,
    updated_volume DECIMAL NOT NULL,
    updated_timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);
